- I Am Number Four: This is a science fiction movie that follows a young boy named Number Four who must survive in a world where aliens have taken over Earth. The movie stars Beau Mirchoff as Number Four and Karen Allen as the girl who falls in love with Number Four.

- Waiting: This is a drama movie that follows a young woman named Claire who agrees to bear a child for another couple. The movie stars Denzel Washington as a police officer who becomes involved with Claire's case, and Chloë Grace Moretz as Claire herself.

- The Equalizer: This is an action crime thriller movie that follows a private detective named James Wilcox who has become known as the "Equalizer" due to his ability to take down powerful criminals. The movie stars James Wilcox himself as the Equalizer, Denzel Washington as a police officer who becomes involved with the case of the Equalizer, and Chloë Grace Moretz as a witness to the case of the Equalizer.

- The Secret: This is a drama movie that follows a couple named Jack and Maria who have been married for many years but have never had children together. One day, Jack receives an anonymous phone call from someone claiming to be the "Equalizer" who has discovered that Jack and Maria were the last surviving members of a powerful secret society that was wiped out by the Equalizer himself many years ago. According to the caller, the equalizer now wants to take down Jack and Maria and restore their place in the secret society once again. In order to prevent this from happening, Jack and Maria must come up with a plan to defeat the equalizer and save themselves and their place in the secret society once again.
